quotes.quote: Get Comfortable being uncomfortable
Find what makes you feel comfortable. The confidence you wear your clothes in is what's really going to shine.
Fear only the warm embrace of passive stupidity.
Being comfortable isn't the way to learn to expand your abilities.
Don't get too comfortable with who you are at any given time - you may miss the opportunity to become who you want to be.
Just be comfortable with who you are.
Be warm, be pure, be amorous, but be chaste.
There's some quality you get when you're not totally comfortable. When you're not doing what you're used to, you could completely fall on your face. You could completely blow it.
You can't just be in one thing and be comfortable in that one thing. You have to understand multiple things and how they all connect.
If youre comfortable with who you are, it shows in your walk.
It's uncomfortable to resist the urge to settle.
When you're comfortable, you're not necessarily inclined to care about things that are contributing to your comfort. It's difficult.
Comfortable means gradually more and more flattened down, more and more blunt - less and less sharp and biting into you.
The more you seek the uncomfortable, the more you will become comfortable.
You have to be comfortable in the uncomfortableness.
Its important to be comfortable with uncertainty.
If you're comfortable in your own skin, you will feel beautiful - and look beautiful to others, too.
As you warm the climate, you basically raise the speed limit on hurricanes.
There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction.
There's nothing wrong with a woman being comfortable, confident.
If we really feel like we're comfortable in our own skins now, we have a longer period of time to live out that kind of third or fourth act of our life.
One sits more comfortably on a colour that one likes.
You can't comfort the afflicted with afflicting the comfortable.
You can't control how other people see you or think of you. But you have to be comfortable with that.

quotes.cite: Princess Tatiana of Greece and Denmark
quotes.quote: Just be comfortable in your own skin. And that's how you can be the sexiest woman that you can possibly be.
We must become more comfortable with probability and uncertainty.
There's nothing as cozy as a piece of candy and a book.
Get comfortable with being alone. It will empower you.
